results.title: Heart Rate Control during Experimental Sepsis in Mice: Comparison of Ivabradine and beta-Blockers.
results.text_hl: This work aimed at assessing the hemodynamic effects of @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ as compared with a beta-blocker (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) during @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Peritonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@peritonitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Bedet A, Voiriot G, Ternacle J, Marcos E, Adnot S, Derumeaux G, Mekontso Dessap A. Heart Rate Control during Experimental Sepsis in Mice: Comparison of Ivabradine and beta-Blockers. Anesthesiology. 2020 Feb;132(2):321-329. PMID: 31939847

results.title: [Sclerosing encapsulating peritonitis in a patient treated with atenolol being].

citations.NLM: Santos-Magadán S, Chiva-de-Agustín M. [Sclerosing encapsulating peritonitis in a patient treated with atenolol being]. Radiologia. 2014 Nov-Dec;56(6):561-2. PMID: 23623307
